data.eml:eml: The catshark genus Scyliorhinus (Chondrichthyes: Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae): taxonomy, morphology and distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Soares, Karla D. A., De, Marcelo R. (2019): The catshark genus Scyliorhinus (Chondrichthyes: Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae): taxonomy, morphology and distribution. Zootaxa 4601 (1): 1-147, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4601.1.1
